name: ZeroNote
short_description: Offline-first encrypted notes with local storage and end-to-end encryption.
description: ZeroNote is an offline-first notes application with strong encryption. Your notes are encrypted locally before storage, meaning the server never sees plain text content. Features include end-to-end encryption, markdown support, tags and organization, offline capability, and self-hosted privacy.
usecases: Private notes that server cannot read.
